title: China's Crypto Ban
description: A fast breakdown of China's Crypto Ban for builders.

hook.text: China banned crypto trading, mining, and transactions in 2021. It was the most powerful nation to reject crypto entirely.

buildup.text: Before the ban, China hosted over 65% of global Bitcoin mining. The crackdown forced miners to relocate overnight.

discovery.text: Miners moved to the US, Kazakhstan, and other countries. Bitcoin's hash rate recovered within months.

twist.text: Despite the ban, Chinese citizens still trade crypto using VPNs and offshore exchanges. Enforcement is imperfect.

climax.text: China proved a nation can ban crypto. It also proved that bans don't eliminate demand â€” they just push it underground.

punchline.text: China banned crypto. The network didn't notice for long.

quiz.question: What happened after China banned Bitcoin mining?
options: Miners relocated globally and the hash rate recovered within months
